12 Reasons to shop local for the holidays

17 Dec 2012

Last June, in a post titled “New Directions for Hypenotic”, I explained how our experience at the BALLE conference had refocussed our mission from manifesting a more sustainable economy to helping manifest a more generative economy.

We’ve continued to work with organizations that foster good things like MaRS (especially the Centre for Impact Investing), PARC, Toronto Public Health, et al, but we’ve taken a new step in our commitment to the city of Toronto.

It’s short notice but the group who met at the conference is piloting a “Local First Campaign” and we’ve created an infographic listing some stats around the benefits of shopping local.

Beyond the (not to be underestimated) returns of buying from people with a care for craft, there are plenty of verified long term financial and quality of life returns that come from buying from a neighbour.

Please feel free to share or print a (7MB .pdf) of the 12 Reasons to Give the Gift of Local artwork.

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
